title: Armed Robbery and Carjacking
address: West Nelson Circle St George Mesquite
description: An armed robbery suspect evaded police, leading to a car chase that began in St George and ended in Mesquite. The suspect carjacked a White Chevy Blazer with California plates and drove onto a golf course. The suspect was armed and eventually shot, with the situation concluding as a self-inflicted fatality.
